oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Monuments on Orchard Knob, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of monuments and trees at the top of Orchard Knob in Chattanooga. There are two cannons positioned next to one of the monuments on right. Features a divided back and handwritten correspondence on reverse. March 21, 1909 postmark. Postcard made in Germany. [No. 382] [No. 53398]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton county (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Log cabins; Trees; Cannons; Monuments & memorials
